resources.string: We are unable to get location for the app

No need to travel abroad or spend money on expensive shopping centers, because Indonesia also has lots of interesting places waiting to be explored soon. From starting sea and beach tours, mountains, lakes, forests, and many others, all can be easily found in this application.

To get a sensation while on vacation, of course, the vacation places that will be visited must be sought out first, do not let us be disappointed after arriving at the vacation spot and finally unable to enjoy. Everything is in here!
Help your friends find a place that is fun, no need to write much anymore, just say a few sentences, then add the value to the place you like.
Hi there! We can\'t get Near By Location without location permission, could you please grant it?
Hi there! Please turn on GPS to detect current location.
El email debe contener entre 4 y 100 caracteres
La contrase침a debe contener entre 4 y 100 caracteres
El nombre debe contener entre 3 y 50 caracteres
Los apellidos deben contener entre 3 y 100 caracteres
